summary: In this mod the Dragon-Born talks to Nox (The NPC). Nox need's help with many tasks ex: retrieving books, killing enemy's.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]The Dragon-Born is tasked with Helping Nox. First she need's help killing Dragar a evil bandit that stole her sword. Then she send's you to steal an ancient book that she need's. That is the Quest I hope you enjoy!

[/size]"You will also have to download a SEQ file to have the Dialogue work"
author: Skyrim-Mods
